ValidationRule.description: Samples Courier is required in order to Submit a Claim when the Samples Collected field is "Yes"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Origin) = 'Owner', TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor', TEXT(Origin) = 'Distributor' ), OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), TEXT( Samples_Collected__c ) = 'Yes', ISBLANK( TEXT(Courier__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a Courier prior to Submitting a Claim.
